data.text: “Mũndũ ũciarĩtwo nĩ mũndũ-wa-nja-rĩ,
Akũraga ta ihũa na agacooka akooma;
Mũndũ ta ũcio wakĩmũkũũrĩra maitho?
Nũũ ũngĩhota kũruta kĩndũ gĩtheru kuuma harĩ kĩndũ kĩrĩa gĩtarĩ gĩtheru?
Matukũ ma mũndũ nĩ matare;
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio tiga kũmũrora, tigana nake,
“Mũtĩ-rĩ, nĩwĩrĩgagĩrĩrwo atĩ ũngĩtemwo,
O na mĩri yaguo ĩngĩkũrĩra thĩ
ũngĩkaguucia maaĩ-rĩ, nĩũgathethũka
No mũndũ akuuaga agathikwo;
O ta ũrĩa maaĩ mahũũaga kũu iria-inĩ,
ũguo noguo mũndũ akomaga na ndacookaga gũũkĩra rĩngĩ;
“Naarĩ korwo wahitha thĩinĩ wa mbĩrĩra,
Mũndũ akua-rĩ, nĩagatũũra muoyo rĩngĩ?
Wee ũgetana, na niĩ nĩngagwĩtĩka;
Hĩndĩ ĩyo nĩũgatara makinya makwa,
Mahĩtia makwa meekĩrĩtwo mondo-inĩ,
“No rĩrĩ, o ta ũrĩa kĩrĩma kĩenjekaga na gĩkamomoka,
na o ta ũrĩa maaĩ mamuthũraga mahiga,
Wee ũmũtooragia o rĩmwe rĩa kũigana, nake agathira;
Ariũ ake mangĩheo gĩtĩĩo, ndangĩmenya ũhoro ũcio;
We no ruo rwa mwĩrĩ wake aiguaga,
